titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (GEROTAS FASCIA) - Description

div.p: TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR (GEROTAS FASCIA) is the same as attribute TUMOUR INVASION INDICATOR FOR KIDNEY, to indicate if the Tumour has invaded the Gerota's fascia (the fascia anterior to the perinephric space) during an Urological Cancer Care Spell.
